room_title: Escape room "The Bistro" by Escape The Post in Detroit
review: Super fun escape room! We did the Bistro and it was pretty challenging and fun with hidden compartments and rooms. Will definitely be going back to try their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Bistro" by Escape The Post in Detroit
review: We had a great experience! We did the Zombie Apocalypse room as well as The Bistro room! Both were challenging and so much fun! The staff is amazing as well as the owner! Definitely a great time!

room_title: Escape room "The Bistro" by Escape The Post in Detroit
review: We decided to try it out for my birthday! I'm pregnant so I figured it would be a fun family event. There was 6 of us and we did the Bistro. We had a blast! We even solved the mystery. We won a free admission since we solved it. I'd do it again!
